column4: My Ubuntu desktop computer refuses to boot (I get a 'Gave up waiting for root device.' error). It booted fine six days ago, before I shut it off to go spend holidays with my family. Now it fails. Please tell me how to get my desktop working again so I'm not stuck on my laptop.

My Ubuntu 10.10 desktop computer refuses to boot (I get a 'Gave up waiting for root device.' error). It booted fine six days ago, before I shut it off to go spend holidays with my family. Now it fails. Please tell me how to get my desktop working again so I'm not stuck on my laptop. Can anyone help?
can you boot into recovery mode?
